title: Dawn of Partnership
description: An early morning training session reveals deeper connections between you and Cha Hae-In as you prepare for upcoming challenges together.

actions.title: Training Invitation
actions.message: Cha Hae-In has sent you a message: 'Meet me at the Hunter Association training facility at dawn. I want to show you some advanced techniques.'

actions.title: Dawn Training Session
actions.description: Meet Cha Hae-In at the Hunter Association for early morning training
objectives: Find Cha Hae-In in the training facility

actions.opening_line: Cha Hae-In is already in the training room, moving through precise sword forms. She notices your arrival and smiles warmly.

choices.text: Ask if she's been here long

dialogue.text: Your instincts are impressive, but let me show you how to channel your energy more efficiently. Watch my stance.

actions.objective: Practice the advanced technique Cha Hae-In demonstrated

actions.prompt: As you attempt to replicate her movements, you feel a surge of power. How do you respond?

choices.text: Focus intensely on perfecting the technique
Ask for her guidance and corrections

milestone.name: Training Partners
milestone.description: Your connection with Cha Hae-In deepens through shared combat expertise

actions.title: Dawn Training
actions.description: The morning you and Cha Hae-In discovered your synchronized fighting potential

dialogue.text: That was... incredible. I've never felt such synchronization with another hunter. We should train together more often.

items.name: Training Partner's Charm
items.description: A small charm Cha Hae-In gave you after your first joint training session

actions.title: Episode Complete
actions.message: Your partnership with Cha Hae-In has reached a new level of trust and coordination
